pages.text: Once you've crafted a jewel, it's time to attach it to your tool or weapon using a $(important)Smithing Table$()!$(br2)$(important)To attach a jewel:$()$(br)1. Open a Smithing Table$(br)2. Place a $(jewel)Jewel Socket Template$() in the template slot$(br)3. Place your tool/weapon in the equipment slot$(br)4. Place the jewel in the material slot$(br)5. Take your upgraded item!

pages.title: Jewel Socket Template
pages.text: Craft the Jewel Socket Template to attach jewels at a Smithing Table. You'll need this template for each jewel you want to attach!

pages.title: Stacking Effects
pages.text: You can attach $(important)multiple jewels$() to the same item!$(br2)Effects of the same type will $(jewel)stack together$(), increasing their power. For example:$(br)$(li)Mining Speed +2$(li)Mining Speed +2$(br)= $(tool)Mining Speed +4$()

pages.title: Visual Indicators
pages.text: Jeweled items display $(special)colorful overlay gems$() showing which effects are applied!$(br2)Each jewel is rendered as a small, glowing gem on your item. The more jewels, the more powerful your item appears!$(br2)$(o)Show off your blinged-out tools to your friends!$()
